author: RTÉ News
title: Pregnant nurse dies of virus, her baby girl survives
description: A pregnant nurse who died in hospital after contracting Covid-19 has been remembered as "highly valued and loved" by her colleagues. Her baby was delivered successfully and is doing well, according to the hospital.
content:
A pregnant nurse who died in hospital after contracting Covid-19 has been remembered as "highly valued and loved" by her colleagues.
Mary Agyeiwaa Agyapong, who worked as a nurse on a general ward at Luton and Dunstable University Hospital in Bedfordshire, E… [+754 chars]
